name: Bull-Bia Ricky
description:
This is a small platformer, (the passage time of the main story is 1-1.5 hours, with additional levels 1.5-2 hours) telling us a short story about a simple guy Ricky Bullbia, who, despite the difficulties encountered along the way, achieved his goal. The story in an easy and cheerful manner teaches us not to give up, because in the end, for our efforts, we will get what is rightfully ours.

Having been defeated in the ring, our hero Ricky Bull-Bia finds himself in an unfamiliar place...
With only perseverance, courage and years of training behind his back, he is determined to come back and win, heading back to the ring.

Help Ricky complete his plans!

You will encounter obstacles and enemies on the way. Some of them need to be dodged, others need to be jumped over. With the third, you need to fight or just pass by with a straight face.
The coach will always help you with his wise advice. And also beloved Ricky will offer you to complete bonus levels in which your head can explode, literally. And, in case of victory, the beloved will reward you. It's up to you to pass or skip the bonus levels. But remember that a true winner does not back down in the face of difficulties.

Having managed to get out of all the difficulties in the story, you will get to the ring again. And now you have no choice but to defeat the boss.

After completing the game, you will have the opportunity to complete a small additional level for another character from the game. After completing this level, you will find out how the journey of the Hero of the game Bull-Bia Ricky ended.
